name: dpgs
description: JSON schema validation for Digital Public Goods nominees & digital public goods

scripts.test: ajv validate -s nominee-schema.json -d "nominees/*.json" && ajv validate -s screening-schema.json -d "digitalpublicgoods/*.json"
scripts.lint: for f in ./nominees/*.json ./digitalpublicgoods/*.json; do jsonlint "$f" > tempfile.tmp; if diff $f tempfile.tmp; then echo "Linting of $f passed"; else echo "Linting of $f failed" && exit 1; fi; done
scripts.lint:fix: for f in ./nominees/*.json ./digitalpublicgoods/*.json; do echo "$f"; jsonlint "$f" -i; echo >> "$f"; done

hooks.pre-commit: npm test && npm run order && npm run check
